EmailTemplate.name: Best Practices for EMS Billing - June 28.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar June 28: Best Practices for EMS Billing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> COMPLIMENTARY LIVE WEBINAR: Best Practices for EMS Billing COMPLIMENTARY LIVE WEBINAR Approved for 1 NAAC CEU Please join us for the upcoming webinar on June 28, at 2 pm Eastern Time (1 pm CT | Noon MT | 11 am PT):
In this upcoming webinar, you'll learn about:
- Daily tips for improving your EMS billing processes - Catching potential 'red flags' - from call intake and field documentation to invoice production and reimbursement to billing and collections - Maximizing your billing and collections - Actual examples from EMS services and lessons learned
PRESENTING: -Larry Cole, TriTech Regional Sales Manager and former Finance Director at Kanawha County Emergency Ambulance Authority -Kathy Ransom, TriTech EMS Industry Education Coordinator, C.A.C.
REGISTER: please copy and paste the following URL into any web browser: http://offers.tritech.com/June28Webinar_Registration.html
